In competition with the PP ARa and PPARδ co-ligand [3H] GW2433, T0070907 has an apparent Ki of 0.85 mM to PP ARa and 1.8 mM to PPARδ.

Here are the extracted sentences with concrete data points that meet the specified criteria:

15-deoxy-D12, 14-prostaglandin J2 is a weak PPARγ ligand and binds at concentrations of 2-5 μM.
Additionally, an oxidized alkyl phospholipids, hexadecyl azelaoyl phosphatidylcholine binds PPARγ with a Kd of approximately 40 nM.
Nitrolinoleic acid, a derivative of linolic acid, has also recently been reported to bind PPARγ with affinities similar to rosiglitazone (Ki>1 μM).
